description: The details of a greenhouse gas emission or offset (negative emission) for a pathway.

pathway.description: The pathway of this source. Use All if the emissions are for all pathways for this enterprise.

name.description: Name of this emission source defined by the enterprise and pathway.

scope.description: GHG emissions scope. 1 = direct emissions from owned or controlled sources, 2 = indirect from the generation of purchased energy, 3 = all other indirect emissions.

CO2.description: The emission of carbon dioxide by this source.

N2O.description: The emission of nitrous oxide by this source.

CH4.description: The emission of methane by this source.

CO2e.description: The emissions for this source expressed as carbon dioxide equivalents.

CO2eIntensity.description: Array of emission intensities for this emission source, each for the specified basis.
